languages.text: "Немезит был мутантом-выродком, как и эти "освободители". Фиолетовая кожа, гребень на лбу — не видала таких?"
"Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"
languages.original_text: "Немезит был мутантом-выродком, как и эти "освободители". Фиолетовая кожа, гребень на лбу — не видала таких?"

traits.locale_text: "The Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead, I trust you've seen those before?"
"The Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead, I trust you've seen those before?"
"The Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

"Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

languages.text: «Su Nemesitio era un monstruo mutante, al igual que estos "libertadores" vuestros. Piel morada, emblema en la frente... Asumo que los habéis visto».
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

traits.locale_text: «Su Nemesitio era un monstruo mutante, al igual que estos "libertadores" vuestros. Piel morada, emblema en la frente... Asumo que los habéis visto».

languages.text: 「奴らのネメサイトは、この'解放者'たちと同じく最悪の変異体だ。紫色の肌、額の紋章…見たことがあるのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

traits.locale_text: 「奴らのネメサイトは、この'解放者'たちと同じく最悪の変異体だ。紫色の肌、額の紋章…見たことがあるのではないか？」

languages.text: “那个涅墨斯特不过是个变种怪物，和那群所谓的解放者一模一样。他们的皮肤是紫色的，额头上还印着印记，你肯定早就见过了吧？”
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

traits.locale_text: “那个涅墨斯特不过是个变种怪物，和那群所谓的解放者一模一样。他们的皮肤是紫色的，额头上还印着印记，你肯定早就见过了吧？”

languages.text: "Ihr Nemesit war ein Mutant, ein Freak, genau wie diese 'Befreier' selbst. Violette Haut, ein Kamm auf der Stirn. Ihr habt so etwas schon einmal gesehen, nehme ich an?"
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Nemesit war ein Mutant, ein Freak, genau wie diese 'Befreier' selbst. Violette Haut, ein Kamm auf der Stirn. Ihr habt so etwas schon einmal gesehen, nehme ich an?"

languages.text: « Leur Némésite était un mutant, tout comme ceux qui se sont présentés en libérateurs. Peau violette, crête sur le front... J'imagine que vous avez déjà vu de tels stigmates auparavant ? »
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"

traits.locale_text: « Leur Némésite était un mutant, tout comme ceux qui se sont présentés en libérateurs. Peau violette, crête sur le front... J'imagine que vous avez déjà vu de tels stigmates auparavant ? »

languages.text: "Nemezit dedikleri ucube bir mutanttı, tıpkı 'kurtarıcıları' gibi. Ciltleri mor renkte, alınlarında bir işaret vardı. Bunları daha evvel görmüşsünüzdür, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Their Nemesite was a mutant freak, just like these 'liberators' themselves. Purple skin, crest on the forehead — I trust you have seen those before?"
